languages.text: {n}Инскрибия берет в руки свиток с печатями {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}.{/n} "Позвольте зачитать вам решение уважаемых представителей миссии святого Друза. "Тот, кто смел подвергнуть святого сподвижника Анвиласа мученической смерти, клеймлен нами еретиком и сподвижником всяческого зла".

traits.locale_text: {n}Инскрибия берет в руки свиток с печатями {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}.{/n} "Позвольте зачитать вам решение Собора Церквей Простора. "Тот, кто смел подвергнуть святого сподвижника Анвиласа мученической смерти, клеймлен нами еретиком и сподвижником всяческого зла".

languages.text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"
languages.original_text: {n}Инскрибия берет в руки свиток с печатями {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}.{/n} "Позвольте зачитать вам решение уважаемых представителей миссии святого Друза. "Тот, кто смел подвергнуть святого сподвижника Анвиласа мученической смерти, клеймлен нами еретиком и сподвижником всяческого зла".

'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"

{n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"

{n}Inscribia picks up a scroll carrying the seals of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission: 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"

languages.text: {n}Inscribia greift nach einer Schriftrolle mit den Siegeln der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g}.{/n} "Gestattet mir, die Entscheidung der ehrwürdigen Vertreter der Mission des Heiligen Drusus vorzutragen. 'Wir verurteilen {mf|jenen, der|jene, die} Anvylas, einen heiligen Vertreter des Glaubens, verdächtigt hat zum Märtyrertod als {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerin} und {mf|Freund|Freundin} des Bösen.'"
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Inscribia greift nach einer Schriftrolle mit den Siegeln der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g}.{/n} "Gestattet mir, die Entscheidung der ehrwürdigen Vertreter der Mission des Heiligen Drusus vorzutragen. 'Wir verurteilen {mf|jenen, der|jene, die} Anvylas, einen heiligen Vertreter des Glaubens, verdächtigt hat zum Märtyrertod als {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerin} und {mf|Freund|Freundin} des Bösen.'"

{n}Inscribia greift zu einer Schriftrolle mit dem Siegel der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g}.{/n} "Gestattet mir, die Entscheidung des Ministerrats der Ausdehnung vorzulesen. 'Wir erklären die Person, die es gewagt hat, Anvylas, heilig und dem Glauben geweiht, dem Märtyrertod zuzuführen, zum Ketzer und Komplizen alles Bösen.'"

languages.text: {n}Inscribia saisit un parchemin qui porte les sceaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}.{/n} « Permettez-moi de lire la décision des honorables représentants de la mission de Saint Drusus. "Nous marquons l'individu ayant osé infliger une mort de martyr à Anvylas, un disciple respectueux de la foi, comme hérétique et complice des plus grands maux qui soient." »
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Inscribia saisit un parchemin qui porte les sceaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}.{/n} « Permettez-moi de lire la décision des honorables représentants de la mission de Saint Drusus. "Nous marquons l'individu ayant osé infliger une mort de martyr à Anvylas, un disciple respectueux de la foi, comme hérétique et complice des plus grands maux qui soient." »

{n}Inscribia saisit un parchemin qui porte les sceaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}.{/n} « Permettez-moi de lire la décision du Conseil ministériel des Étendues. "Nous marquons l'individu ayant osé infliger une mort de martyr à Anvylas, un disciple respectueux de la foi, comme hérétique et complice des plus grands maux qui soient." »

languages.text: {n}缮师拿起一卷卷宗，上面印有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教教会{/g}的印记。{/n}“请允许我宣读圣德鲁苏斯教派各位重要代表的一致决定。‘安维拉斯是国教神圣的信徒。我们认为，胆敢让这位圣人殉道而死的人是异端分子，是一切邪恶之物的同谋。’”
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}缮师拿起一卷卷宗，上面印有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教教会{/g}的印记。{/n}“请允许我宣读圣德鲁苏斯教派各位重要代表的一致决定。‘安维拉斯是国教神圣的信徒。我们认为，胆敢让这位圣人殉道而死的人是异端分子，是一切邪恶之物的同谋。’”
{n}缮师拿起一卷卷宗，上面印有国教教会的印记。{/n}“请允许我宣读科罗努斯扩区教会议会的决定。‘安维拉斯是国教神圣的信徒。我们认为，胆敢让这位圣人殉道而死的人是异端分子，是一切邪恶之物的同谋。’”
{n}缮师拿起一卷卷宗，上面印有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教教会{/g}的印记。{/n}“请允许我宣读科罗努斯扩区教长议会的决定。‘安维拉斯是国教神圣的信徒。我们认为，胆敢让这位圣人殉道而死的人是异端分子，是一切邪恶之物的同谋。’”

languages.text: {n}Inscribia toma en su mano un pergamino con los sellos de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}.{/n} «Ahora permítanme leer el fallo de los honorables representantes de la misión de san Drusus. "Declaramos a quien ha osado someter a una muerte de mártir a Anvylas, un santo devoto de la fe, hereje y cómplice del mal en todas sus formas"».
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Inscribia toma en su mano un pergamino con los sellos de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}.{/n} «Ahora permítanme leer el fallo de los honorables representantes de la misión de san Drusus. "Declaramos a quien ha osado someter a una muerte de mártir a Anvylas, un santo devoto de la fe, hereje y cómplice del mal en todas sus formas"».

{n}Inscribia toma en su mano un pergamino con los sellos de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}.{/n} «Ahora permítanme leer la decisión del Concilio Ministerial de la Extensión. "Declaramos a quien ha osado someter a una muerte de mártir a Anvylas, un santo devoto de la fe, hereje y cómplice del mal en todas sus formas"».

languages.text: {n}インスクリビアは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}の印章が押された巻物を手に取った。{/n}「聖ドルスス聖務団の名誉ある代表者の方々の決定を読み上げさせていただきます。『信仰の聖なる奉仕者であるアンビラスを殉教に至らしめた者に異端者かつあらゆる悪の共犯者の烙印を押す』」
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}インスクリビアは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}の印章が押された巻物を手に取った。{/n}「聖ドルスス聖務団の名誉ある代表者の方々の決定を読み上げさせていただきます。『信仰の聖なる奉仕者であるアンビラスを殉教に至らしめた者に異端者かつあらゆる悪の共犯者の烙印を押す』」

languages.text: {n}İnscribia, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g} mühürlerini taşıyan bir tomar alıyor.{/n} "İzin verin, Aziz Drusus misyonu temsilcilerinin kararını okuyayım: 'İnancı uğruna yaşayan kutsal bir müridi, Anvylas'ı, bir şehit misali ölüme göndermeye cüret eden kişi, her tür kötülüğün suç ortağı ve bir sapkın olarak damgalanmıştır.'"
languages.original_text: {n}Inscribia picks up a scroll that carries the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s seals.{/n} "Allow me to read out the decision of the honoured representatives of the Saint Drusus mission. 'We brand the one who dared subject Anvylas, a holy votary of the faith, to a martyr's death a heretic and an associate to evil of every kind.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}İnscribia, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g} mühürlerini taşıyan bir tomar alıyor.{/n} "İzin verin, Aziz Drusus misyonu temsilcilerinin kararını okuyayım: 'İnancı uğruna yaşayan kutsal bir müridi, Anvylas'ı, bir şehit misali ölüme göndermeye cüret eden kişi, her tür kötülüğün suç ortağı ve bir sapkın olarak damgalanmıştır.'"

{n}İnscribia, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g} mühürlerini taşıyan bir tomar alıyor.{/n} "İzin verin, Enginlik Bakanlar Meclisi'nin kararını okuyayım: 'İnancı uğruna yaşayan kutsal bir müridi, Anvylas'ı, bir şehit misali ölüme göndermeye cüret eden kişi, her tür kötülüğün suç ortağı ve bir sapkın olarak damgalanmıştır.'."
